game.name: Spiral Splatter
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Spiral Splatter는 끊임없이 혼란스러운 퍼즐로 손과 눈의 조정 능력을 극한까지 시험할 아케이드 퍼즐 게임입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spiral Splatter is a brain-bending arcade puzzle game that will push your hand-eye coordination to the limit with nonstop, mind-boggling puzzles!
